changeSet.author: WilliamWelling
changeSet.sql: -- migrate marc records INSERT INTO ${database.defaultSchemaName}.marc_records_lb SELECT r.id AS id, -- mr.id AS id, -- mr.jsonb->>'id' AS id, mr.jsonb->>'content' AS content -- mr.creation_date AS creationDate, -- mr.created_by AS createdBy FROM ${database.defaultSchemaName}.records r INNER JOIN ${database.defaultSchemaName}.marc_records mr ON r.jsonb->>'parsedRecordId' = mr.jsonb->>'id';
